author: Krishna Thevar
title: Maharashtra's Covid fight began on wrong footing, say officials
description: On April 9, the Pune administration sent 425 people, who had high-risk contacts with Covid-infected persons, to Pune’s Sassoon Hospital to be tested for corona virus.
content: Mumbai: On April 9, the Pune administration sent 425 people, who had high-risk contacts with Covid-infected persons, to Pune’s Sassoon Hospital to be tested for corona virus. A few hours later, the hospital refused to test them claiming that “they were not in… [+2103 chars]
